name: Northycote Farm to Moseley Old Hall Walk, Moseley Old Hall

ai.summary: A 11.9 km moderate hike from Northycote Farm to Moseley Old Hall in the UK, following rural lanes, hedgerows, and woodland paths with the option to explore Moseley Old Hall at the end.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily rural footpaths and farm tracks with gentle undulations. Expect grassy or compacted earth surfaces, occasional mud, stiles, and short roadside sections. Surfaces are variable but generally manageable for moderate hikers.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for variable UK weather: check forecast, wear sturdy footwear, and dress in layers. Carry water and a small snack. Stay on marked paths and open gates with care; watch for livestock and farm traffic on rural roads. Bring a map or GPS, a fully charged phone, and a basic first aid kit. Be mindful of mud and slippery surfaces, especially after rain. Allow extra time for Moseley Old Hall visit if you plan to stop.
recommended_gear: Phone with offline maps and emergency contacts
Walking poles (optional but helpful for uneven ground)
ai.best_seasons: Spring to Autumn; year-round hiking is possible with proper gear and caution in winter.
